Class ModifyAppointmentController

controllers.ModifyAppointmentController

javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyAppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
this class is to control the modify appointments screen

    • appointmentToModify

      public void appointmentToModify(Appointment appointment) throws SQLException
      This method populates all of the fields with the appointment object sent over from the appointment controller
      Parameters:
      appointment - appointment object to be modified
      Throws:
      SQLException - for sql errors

    • backButtonClicked

      Throws:

    • saveButtonClicked

      public void saveButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      This method first validates that all fields are filled out, it then validates that the appointment start and end date/times are valid. If everything is correct it will create an appointment in the sql database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - add button clicked
      Throws:
      SQLException - catches sql errors for sql statement
      IOException - catches IO errors for scene change
